summary.span: 和其所有公開成員，是元件物件模型 (COM) 協助工具介面的 Managed 包裝函式的一部分。

span.span: The and all of its exposed members are part of a managed wrapper for the Component Object Model (COM) accessibility interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [Microsoft Active Accessibility](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/dd373592(v=vs.85).aspx)文件。For more information about , see the [Microsoft Active Accessibility](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/dd373592(v=vs.85).aspx) documentation.
